MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateCustomCharacter (int location, byte[] characterMap);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateCustomCharacter(int32 location, unsigned int8[] characterMap) cil managed
Public Sub CreateCustomCharacter (location As Integer, characterMap As Byte())
abstract member CreateCustomCharacter : int * byte[] -> unit override this.CreateCustomCharacter : int * byte[] -> unit

Docs.param: Provide an array of 8 bytes containing the pattern
Docs.summary: Add a specific character to the font. It will replace existing embedded font character if it does already exist.
Docs.remarks: Normal font character is a 5 bytes array aligned vertically. If the array is 8 bytes long, it will assume the font encoding is then on the lower 5 bits of each bytes.

Docs.remarks: Normal font character is a 5 bytes array aligned vertically. If the array is 8 bytes long, it will assume the font encoding is then on the lower 5 bits of each bytes.
